title: Analyze Stock Market Trends openhands
idea: Use historical data to predict future stock movements. Build a model that can analyze trends and make predictions.

title: Build a Recommendation Engine openhands
idea: Create a simple movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering.

title: Test Neural Network Architectures openhands
idea: Compare different neural network architectures for image classification
experiments:
stop_on_fail: true
steps:
  - name: data_loading
    description: Load and preprocess CIFAR-10 dataset
    cmd: python scripts/load_data.py
    sanity:
      - type: file_exists
        path: artifacts/data/train.pkl
    retry: 2
    timeout_minutes: 20
  - name: train_baseline_cnn
    description: Train baseline CNN model
    cmd: python scripts/train_baseline.py --epochs 10
    sanity:
      - type: json_value
        path: artifacts/baseline/metrics.json
        key: accuracy
        operator: '>'
        value: 0.6
    retry: 3
    timeout_minutes: 120
